text: Mustafa Mauludi is a kurdish politician and the ex-leader of Kurdistan Democratic Party (Iran). He was selected as leader by central committee of KDP (Iran) on 15 January 2017 after resignation of Khaled Azizi. == Early life and education == He was born in 1958 from Naqadeh, a city of West Azerbaijan Province.http://www.radiofarda.com/a/28238273.html He graduated in Law from the university of Koya. ==References== Category:Kurdistan Democratic Party politicians Category:1959 births Category:Living people
title: Mostafa Moloudi
